name: afastidioushat
text: If the pizza was hawaiian I'd be totally down with a cat hacking into yahoo if I worked there.

name: biddlebubbly
text: They're called T.I.C.K.L.E. scripts because they leave sassy comments in the network logs which can't help but be laughed at.

name: zem
text: A comment left by zem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by randombeing, Sakana, rowboat, woodenteeth, pitseleh)

name: sp1derbaby
text: ...screamed the man in the beret, gesticulating wildly and spilling coffee over the frightened denizens of the Arthüs Café.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Why does the Internet hate accents?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: just assetbar.

name: carlyle
text: And Ray!

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i do not remember typing this.

name: cygnusx-1
text: Were you inebriated at the time?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: no, suprisingly.

name: zem
text: how do you know?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: because i did not partake ever at the time.

name: madrin
text:
is that... a teutonic knight?
classy.

name: sakana
text:
1) Is that the first time Beef has ever used an exclamation mark?

2) Noticed the "Jerry" on the note and I laughed out loud. Oh what a nerd am I.

name: connellingus
text: He also uses an exclamation mark here .

name: 1000hz
text: and here .

name: joebot
text: what the hell... and here .

name: tekende
text:
and here
(I am pointing at my groin)

name: stuart
text:
It's the first time he uses it without a preceding space.

The second is here

name: dovey
text: [url="http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uuacGB3h7"]nope.[/url]

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by divot, Overmedicated, Wulvaine)

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Hammertime.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i do not remember typing this, either.

dang. where have i been?

name: rowboat
text: Man, I don't remember three quarters of the posts I make here. But I use drugs.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i typically do. that week was apparently about me  finding the %3 i have forgotten about.

name: fuzzyshoo
text: We also would have accepted "collaborate and listen."

name: allanpinkerton
text: Actually, you can't tell if Beef is saying anything in that strip.

name: canusdivinus
text: In this and the chicken-related exclamation mark strips, the mark is attached to the word, as he is trying not to speak as himself. When it's just Beef speaking as Beef, the punctuation is spaced out. Just an observation.

name: centipede_damascus
text: The geeks love ham pizzas.

name: evolume
text: ...and scouring Achewood for exclamation marks.

name: afronaut
text: Is it just me, or are those pizzas tiny? Theyre regular size compared to Beef.

name: rowboat
text: They're pizzas for cats.

name: drycup
text: Beef's handwriting is probably better than the average cat's handwriting, but still very poor.

name: editrix
text: It's all about the reverse Fibonacci sequence for me.

name: nagsworth
text: I love the smoke coming from the cigarette, so much better than the squiggly line used in earlier strips, so much slicker than your usual puffy cloud-like smoke. Plus it adds to the atmosphere, Beef sat in the dark like some private investigator.

name: heccibiggs
text: Smoking in near-darkness IS the coolest thing ever. Especially when it's quiet enough to be able to hear the cigarette burning away every time you inhale.

name: snowman
text: Ooh, yeah.  *shiver*

name: spinynorman
text:
The coolest thing ever is a shot from the credits of the second season of The Wire. It's a shot of a silhouette of a guy with headphones on and his hands over the headphones, bowing his head with the coarse red ember of a lit cigarette burning bright at his chin, a lone streamer of smoke curling up across his face, which is completely black.

Check it out on youtube. Wire. Season two.

name: cagliostro
text: Chubbied to denote instantaneous agreement.

name: songbirdspectre
text: There is nothing sexier than a cat that is on his game.

name: i_love_kate
text:
That is your opinion and I respect it.

Except I don't. Not really.

name: the_doz
text: Ugh. Something about frigo makes me want to stab things.

name: zeal
text: Whenever I start to question the logistics of a man of small means like Beef paying for 15 pizzas like that, I picture Ray giving Beef a black, secret credit card for this mission.  "Spend whatever you have to, man.  Just get it done."

name: charchar
text: I always wanted to order a bunch of pizzas, then just take them from the deliverer and lock the door.

name: tekende
text: But then you open the door and go "Haha just kidding" and pay the guy along with a nice tip, right?

name: drago25
text: The smoke in panels 1-4 totally give me a chubby

name: saucy_jack
text: "Cause pizzas to be delivered," as if it's far more complex than ordering pizzas and then taking them there himself.

name: snowman
text: Really impressed with that smoke.  Dang.

name: atticusonline
text: odwalla is hella nasty milk

name: awko
text:
"...the delivery man: a one Mr. R. Beef Kazenzakis"

One day I'm going to open a restaurant and I will serve something called a Beef Kazenzakis .

It just sounds so Goddamn delicious.

name: inthewater
text: Roast Beef: Hacker extraordinaire, and master of disguise.

name: wonelove
text: Beef doesn't mess around

name: genequagmire
text: Beef is Greek?

name: asherdan
text: You ever notice how a baseball cap is the standard 'disguise' utility piece?

name: nice-on-water
text: I thought that was One (1) Waxed Handlebar Mustache, Brown.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: No, of course not.

name: mercurcia
text: Reverse Fibonacci Sequence is Totally Sexy. I swear, I'm not lying,  Poor Beef.

name: dybrar
text: The cigarette smoke in panel one looks like two watchful birds.
